description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Child Health, Sanitation, Wash â€“ General. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Enhanced and equitable availability and use of drinking water, sanitation services and good hygiene practices, especially in identified vulnerable communities for reduced morbidity and mortality among under-5 children and women
